channel.title: sendQuest and c
channel.description:
hey guys
just two little questions: 1. what exactly does sendQuest do? i guess its something to do with drawing text on the screen? if so, how do you use it properly to draw score in the upper right corner? 2. what does c. in front of a variable do? does that mean its a local variable?

item.title: sendQuest and c
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

[quote=“debeste95, post:4, topic:380051”]someone who could give me an example of how to use it to draw score in the upper ricght corner? delta btw[/quote]You need to find out the string ID, I don’t know it sorry.

item.title: sendQuest and c
item.dc:creator: @Wintercanon Wintercanon
item.description:
@Wintercanon wrote:

Well it depends on your server base, I believe that in Winterlove servers the sendQuest function rewrote over strings stored in the client. I’m guessing it was originally used to rename quest names in the quest tab interface and what not.

The c infront of a variable makes it client-specific. The c is usually an instanced Client class. So c.playerName for example would be different for each player logged in.

Read full topic
